attributes.action: Reinstate right to buy without regional capping
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The PM is talking about a Government that is fair for all, however in the past people were given the right to buy there council house, then the Labour Government introduced a cap on the discount that was allowed. This has led to inequality, for example my neighbours bought there house for £30k and got full discount after the min. required time, I have been in council housing for over 20yr and I am being capped. I am expected to pay over £110k rather than the £50k I would be paying with equal discount. Fair for all means equality, REMOVE THE CAP.
